sentences.sentence: He was treated with penicillin injections.
One dose of penicillin can wipe out the infection.
sentences.translation: 一剂青霉素即可消除感染。

sentences.sentence: Farmers often give penicillin to beef and poultry, and because of this, penicillin has been found in the milk of treated cows.
sentences.translation: 农民经常给牛肉和家禽注射青霉素，因此这些被注射过的奶牛的奶中含有青霉素。
